scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:db"
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8000
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.db:reset: cd docker && docker-compose down -v && docker-compose up -d
